author: cnbc.com
title: Tredegar Board Declares Dividend
text:
RICHMOND, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The board of directors of Tredegar Corporation (NYSE:TG) declared a quarterly dividend of eleven cents ($0.11) per share on the companyâ€™s common stock. The dividend is payable on April 1, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 16, 2018.
